data.title: Toronto Star
data.meta_description: Toronto Star - a place for remembering loved ones; a space for sharing memories, life stories, milestones, to express condolences, and celebrate life of your loved ones.
data.text:
BILLY SHERMAN Obituary

SHERMAN, BILLY It is with great sadness that we announce his passing at home, peacefully, with Lyne by his side on Tuesday, August 27, 2024. Billy Sherman, predeceased by his parents, Leo and Pearl. Beloved husband of Lyne Savard....

Published online August 29, 2024

NICK KOUFIS Obituary

KOUFIS, NICK Born October 20, 1932. Passed away peacefully surrounded by family on August 26, 2024. He was a loving devoted husband to Katina (nee Stamkos) for 67 years. Dear father of Helen (Al), Irene, Bill (Diane), and John (Gail)....

Published online August 29, 2024

LORETTA PHILOMENA STOREY Obituary

STOREY, LORETTA PHILOMENA (nee JAMES) It is with great sadness that we announce that Loretta passed away peacefully at the Dorothy Ley Hospice in her 85th year. Loretta leaves behind a lasting legacy, predeceased by her husband, Ivan and...

Published online August 28, 2024

MURRAY AUSTIN DOW Obituary

DOW, MURRAY AUSTIN Passed away peacefully, at the Guelph General Hospital, with his daughters by his side on Sunday, August 25, 2024, at the age of 94. Beloved husband of 67 years to the late, Margaret Kathleen Dow (nee Orr). Loving...

Published online August 28, 2024

RODERIC GRAHAM FERGUSON Obituary

FERGUSON, RODERIC GRAHAM KC, B.A (Hons), LL.B, LL.M, CS, LSM Passed away peacefully on Friday, August 23, 2024 at Hospice Huronia - Tomkins House, Penetanguishene in his 81st year. Roderic of Midland, beloved husband of Frances Ferguson...

Published online August 28, 2024

NORM FORMAN Obituary

FORMAN, NORM August 26, 1935 – August 24, 2024 Beloved Father Norm Forman, aged 88, passed away peacefully, on August 24, 2024, in Toronto, Ontario surrounded by family. Born on August 26, 1935, in New York City, Norm spent his final...

Published online August 28, 2024

GIUSEPPE PISANO Obituary

PISANO, GIUSEPPE Peacefully, at Mackenzie Health, Richmond Hill, on August 24, 2024, in his 98th year. Beloved husband of the late Emma Maria. Loving father to the late Frank, Clara (Chester), Michael (Mara), Vito (Nancy), Adriana...

Published online August 28, 2024

THOMAS STEWART MERIFIELD Obituary

MERIFIELD, THOMAS STEWART June 13, 1953 – August 25, 2024 Passed away peacefully, in Cambridge, Ontario, at the age of 71. Son of the late Russell R. and Helen (Kydd) Merifield, Tom is survived by his wife, Linda (Wilkinson); his...

Published online August 28, 2024

MAINA SHASTRI Obituary

SHASTRI, MAINA (nee HIRA) 1939 - 2024 Maina Shastri, our dear sweet, kind and graceful Mother, passed away on the evening of August 24, 2024, having recently celebrated her 85th birthday. Mum was born on August 16, 1939, in Mombasa,...

Published online August 28, 2024

PHILOMENA MENDONZA Obituary

MENDONZA, PHILOMENA Philomena Mendonza (née Nazarene) at the age of 92, on August 20, 2024. She was preceded in death by Francis Mendonza, her cherished husband of 39 years; her brother, Richard Nazarene; and her sister-in-law, Rita...

Published online August 28, 2024

KAREN MARIE RIDGELY Obituary

RIDGELY, KAREN MARIE (nee MUNRO) March 20, 1938 - August 23, 2024 On Friday, August 23, 2024, in the presence of her four children, Karen Ridgely peacefully departed, surrounded by love. Karen was unabashed in her pride of family:...

Published online August 28, 2024

BROTHER

ARTHUR WHITE, S.J. Obituary

WHITE, S.J., BROTHER ARTHUR Arthur White, of the Society of Jesus, a Jesuit brother, died on August 23, 2024. Arthur was born in Winnipeg, Manitoba, October 23, 1936, went to St. Paul Jesuit High School there, and entered the Jesuit...

Published online August 27, 2024

JOHN ZANE SWAIGEN Obituary

SWAIGEN, JOHN ZANE January 28, 1944 - August 19, 2024 Peacefully, at home surrounded by family. Survived by wife, Arel Agnew; former wife, Joyce Young; children, Julia Swaigen (Keith Hightower) and Sarah Lynn Swaigen (Joel Visentin);...

Published online August 27, 2024

WILLIAM POLSON WATT Obituary

WATT, WILLIAM POLSON September 30, 1931 - August 22, 2024 William ("Bill") Polson Watt passed away peacefully on August 22, 2024, at the age of 92, at North York General Hospital. The family wishes to thank the compassionate and...

Published online August 27, 2024

REMO MICHELINI Obituary

MICHELINI, REMO September 17, 1927 – August 23, 2024 Remo was born in Cussignacco, Friuli. He was a devoted husband to Lina (née Violino), loving father to Carla and Gian Paolo (Susan), proud Nonno to Alexandria (Aleko) and Katarina...

Published online August 27, 2024

MRS. BEATRICE MUMMERY Obituary

MUMMERY, MRS. BEATRICE At The Village of Humber Heights on Thursday, August 22, 2024 in her 101st year passed away peacefully. Predeceased by her beloved husband. George. Loving mother to Linda (late Stan) Morris, Janice Mummery (David),...

Published online August 26, 2024

GAIL MOREAU Obituary

MOREAU, GAIL (nee Keefe) November 30, 1946 – July 17, 2024 Gail passed away peacefully, in Quimper Hospital, France; her loving husband, Eric by her side. She was predeceased by her parents, Tom and Norma Keefe; and by brothers, Tom...

Published online August 26, 2024

JOHN QUARTARO Obituary

QUARTARO, JOHN December 15, 1943 – August 21, 2024 With great sadness we share word of John's peaceful passing, at the age of 80, with his loving and heartbroken family at his side. John and his beloved wife, Georgia, were married for...

Published online August 26, 2024

ROBERT MUIR LINDSAY Obituary

LINDSAY, ROBERT MUIR On July 10, 2024, Robert Muir Lindsay passed away peacefully, in his 100th year. Father of three; grandfather of four; and great-grandfather of five. Proudly a Veteran of the RCAF, from 1943-1945. He had a long full...

Published online August 26, 2024

JOHN RICHARD "DICK" FLYNN Obituary

FLYNN, JOHN RICHARD "DICK" 1943 – 2024 Dick Flynn died surrounded by his family on August 23, 2024, after a challenging four years of living with Alzheimer's disease. He leaves his beloved wife of 56 years, Marilyn Flynn (nee Keefe);...

Published online August 25, 2024

BARBARA ANN MANLEY Obituary

MANLEY, BARBARA ANN (nee HOTHAM) In Loving Memory Barbara Manley, 78, passed away on August 21, 2024. She was predeceased by her husband, Thomas. She is survived by sons, John, Mark, and Kevin; grandchildren, Jonah, Mateo, and Eliana;...

Published online August 25, 2024
